item.title: Java Backend Engineer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking to expand our team with a couple of very strong backend Java engineers. You will enjoy working with us if you like to figure things out and can work with minimal guidance. Ability to communicate well will be the key (mostly written communication -- to do code reviews, discuss design ideas on the slack channel). You shall be amazing at your current domain and shall be willing to learn new tech (we will provide paid time to learn) as needed.

The work will involve,
a) Java development on our web services stack. In particular SpringBoot.
b) Use backend databases -- Oracle, MySQL, elastic search, Druid
c) Dockerization/Cloud deployment of applications, experience working with Linux, Amazon EC2
d) JUnit tests, JMeter tests of the stack. Git pull-request workflow.
e) Optional -- Front-end development using Angular6 (TypeScript) or React or JS in general
f) Ability to go through thousands of lines of code and quickly pick up a new domain is a solid plus
g) Code quality tools like SonarQube

If you have front-end experience (Angular, React, TypeScript) please call that out.

To start, your main focus will be to improve the code quality and JUnit coverage of a backend system that has over 500k lines of code. This will require you to figure out literally thousands of lines of code and understand how it works with minimal guidance.

After this initial task, you will be engaged in adding enhancements, work on the new products/projects etc.

If this sounds interesting, please write to us about your technology experience, please tell us about a couple of key projects you did.  

Please provide your linked-in public profile. Tell us if you are active on blogs Or if you are an active contributor to stack-overflow?

Please mention how much time per day/week you can allocate us. What will be your working hours (in ET NYC time zone). And when can you start.

Please note that after a few test tasks, if we decide to work long-term, you need to go through background checks with upwork enterprise.

When you apply please put the following line somewhere at the beginning

"::JUNIT::Backend::Java::"

Thanks for your time.


Posted On: August 17, 2018 21:26 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: GitHub, J2EE, Java, JavaScript, JUnit, Multithreaded Programming, MySQL Programming, Spring Boot, Spring Framework, TypeScript
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Veg-O-Meter: calculate how many vegetables a person ate and recommend how many more to eat per day - Upwork
item.description:
Add an email Field to Farm2.me page to accept signups.
- save to Farm2Me database (new database)
Once email is entered, load a second field (password field)
- save to Farm2Me database (new database)
Once password is entered, load a third field (phone number) to receive the challenge text messages
Create fields to track users progress, daily
Create a 2nd database with a chart of # of fruit/vegetable in a serving of that fruit and vegetable. Example: # of strawberries in a serving of strawberries.

• Use Cron to schedule, and code to call functions on Twilio
          [ Cron (https://www.wikiwand.com/en/Cron) allows us to do something at a certain time every day. We want our messages sent at 8:45pm every day. This should be built into a linux operating system ]
• Then you use an Endpoint to get the response # of fruits / vegetable pieces eaten
• Your server side code that’s attached to that endpoint saves it to the DB
• use Dialogflow to determine what fruit/vegetable they entered (use a few synonyms for each fruit and vegetable
• Use a math algorithm to determine how many fruits they ate of each fruit, number of each fruit per each fruit serving, total servings of fruit/vegetable they ate, and the percentage of the total servings they should have in a day.
      - store in database, daily
      - if <100% then send text message that they need to have X number of more servings tomorrow
      - If < or equal to 100% then send text message saying they met their daily requirement (6 more days to go to meet first goal: 1 week)
•if they keep up with 100% for 2nd day in a row (consecutive) then use an algorithm and Twilio to send automated message that says “2nd day of 100% - you’re on a roll!  Keep going”
if they keep up with 100% for 3rd day in a row (consecutive) then use an algorithm and Twilio to send automated message that says “3rd day straight!  Nice job.”
•if they keep up with 100% for 4th day in a row (consecutive) then use an algorithm and Twilio to send automated message that says “Another day meeting your goals.... You’re half way done this week!  Keep it up”
•if they keep up with 100% for 7th day in a row (consecutive) then use an algorithm and Twilio to send automated message that says “1 week straight! Congratulations! Here’s a free ________ (link URL) for working so hard. “ and send a link to a Silver Farm2Me badge image.

Do you want to continue and go for another week? YES to continue or NO to stop”
        - if they type and send YES, then continue to send messages
        - if they type and send NO, stop messages
       [ Twilio sends the text messages to our endpoint, then our code should parse out the message and decide what to do with it.  It can determine a number ]
• Once they complete a 2-week program (consecutively 14 days straight), send message saying “Congratulations!  You completed 2 weeks straight of eating your seasonal fruits & veggies.  Here’s a free ________ (link URL) for working so hard. “ and send a link to a Gold Farm2Me badge image.”
• Once they complete a 4-week program (consecutively 28 days straight), send message saying “Congratulations!  You completed a month.  Here’s a free ________ (link URL) for working so hard. “ and send a link to a Platinum Farm2Me badge image.” And STOP sending them messages.
• If NO, or completed a 1-month (both cases account STOP receiving messages).  In 2-3 weeks later, send a followup message to them and ask “Do you want to complete a new challenge?”
• if YES, send them link to our Veg-O-meter Page to sign up for a new challenge {​URL Link}​
• if NO, then put the account on hold for 2-3 weeks and repeat message


****** We have a Similar app you can use as the foundation to rebuild this and add 6-8 new functionalities, so less work.

****** The Twilio API lets us send text messages with pictures. https://www.twilio.com/

****** The Pinterest API lets us use pinterest board(s) to keep the images that we send daily. For example, our system uses this URL:
https://api.pinterest.com/v1/boards/worthyhealth/health-fitness/pins/?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN_HERE&fields=id%2Cimage
To get the images in a machine-readable format from this pinterest board:
https://www.pinterest.com/worthyhealth/health-fitness/

****** Meteor, a NodeJS framework or Drupal (https://www.drupal.org) lets us get code from the open source community to work with the Pinterest API and Twilio and tie things together:  https://www.twilio.com/blog/2015/07/building-a-group-messaging-app-with-meteor-mongodb-and-twilio.html

Budget: $100
Posted On: August 17, 2018 21:26 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: Database Design, Meteor.js, Twilio API
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Senior PHP/Symfony @ PlugSurfing - Upwork
item.description:
# Who We Are
We help electric car drivers to charge their car anywhere, anytime. Not familiar with the world of e-mobility? Do not worry, it's really exciting. It is a market, with new opportunities, where both the mobility and the energy revolution are taking place.
Plugsurfing is a dedicated and hard-working team, focused on our goal to become the number one player for electric car charging. We look forward to having you on our team!

- All written communication is in English
- SCRUM processes
- Continuous integration with Phabricator, Jenkins, and Ansible
- Our tech stack:
  - AWS
  - HAProxy
  - Nginx
  - PHP-FPM
  - OOP PHP5
  - PHPUnit
  - MySQL/MariaDB
  - Redis
  - APCu
  - Angular

# Top Reasons to Work With Us
- We connect dozens of leading brands with thousands of customers.
- As a first mover we are always open for innovation.
- We are a close knit team of 20+ people that are laid back and casual.

# What You Will Be Doing
Mainly, you will help us develop our PHP backend. The PHP backend is the core of our system, connecting web and mobile applications with our database as well as connecting us to our industry partners, bi-directional.

Our core technologies that you will be working with are:
- Symfony2
- OOP PHP
- PHPUnit
- MySQL/MariaDB
- Redis
- APCu

You will be participating in the incremental development of our Symfony2 system, which connects to our apps and partners through REST and SOAP APIs using JSON and XML.

# Your Profile
Experience with:
- Object oriented programming and design patterns
- Applying OOP principles like, for example, SOLID, DRY, and YAGNI
- 2+ years of Symfony2
- REST and SOAP interfaces
- Enthusiastic about clean code
- PHPUnit/functional testing
- Git (or similar)
- A plus: you have experience with TDD
- A plus: contributions to any open-source project


Posted On: August 17, 2018 21:26 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: PHP, SQL, Symfony
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: New Website Design with API and Database - Upwork
item.description:
We need to find a developer to help us to design and develop a new eCommerce website, also develop an in-house software to integrate with the new website.

Required Skills
PHP
CSS3
HTML5
JavaScript
MySQL
API Building
Website & Web based Aps Development
Well known of e-commerce website & online seller portals

Website Development
A complete and fully functional Website development as per given PSD design.  All relevant algorithm and logic function will be provided ie; Function to display product selection options at customization page.

Programing Languages:  Primarily PHP, then HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery etc.

Along with a complete website required features like, checkout, gateway, newsletter, social etc. compulsory features that must develop and functional are Automatic submission of pages to Google Sitemap, Automatic submission of website products to Google Merchant Center, Meta’s for each pages/products.

Product Database: MySQL preferred. We have approx. 200 product table headers. Along product table, there have to develop other important table like order table, customer table etc.

Backend
We opt to have two backend, one for general website stuffs and other in-house software dashboard which can be accessed by a subdomain of main website url.

General Website Admin Panel: Functions includes but not limited to: Website Pages Management, Category Management, Website Promotion Management, General website Setup etc.

In-house software dashboard:

Functions includes but not limited to: Creating new product based on given algorithm and function, Upload Products and download product report using Excel/Text format, Send product, synchronize s tock & price, update shipping info to Sellercloud (a third party seller solution), website and all ecommerce channel (amazon, ebay etc) using API. Also Interface to monitor sales record collected from all ecommerce channel (amazon, ebay etc), website and ensure User role and privileges setup.

In-house software dashboard will be more expandable and other features to be included in near future.


Posted On: August 17, 2018 21:26 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: CSS, CSS3, HTML, HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, MySQL Administration, PHP, Web Design, Website Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Software/Database Documentation Writer with Graphic Design Skills Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We're a custom software company that creates cloud business database applications. We develop apps rapidly with minimal specification documents and diagrams at the beginning. But good technical and user documentation needs to follow!

We're looking for a freelancer to work with on an ongoing basis to produce user and technical documentation for our clients' apps. The work will be intensive at first, since we have several large projects that need documentation now, and then less intense but steady for years to come.

Our applications are commercial, not scientific, so they're not highly technical, and most apps and processes are of medium complexity.

Skills:
* Very good ability to write two kinds of documentation: user documentation for non-technical business users and technical documentation to support troubleshooting and future development

item.title: Devops Engineer - e-Commerce Speed and Systems Expert - Upwork
item.description:
We are a fast growing e-Commerce International custom product retailer (products made from customer photos). We are currently seeking the services of a systems architect/specialist to conduct and give advice on the following on system and hosting architecture.

Our design tool/webapp is hosted on Amazon EC2.
Our ecommerce mysql database is hosted externally to our website (hosted on AWS).
Our php eCommerce platform is hosted on a dedicated server in Singapore - currently migrating to AWS.

Server speed and location review for website server. Stress testing to dramatically reduce load times and increase server performance. Including review for http2 and recommendations around CDN and/or server location. Our primary marketing is in Australia but we need speed in other Countries also. Dedicated server is currently location in Singapore.

External database hosting review (MYSQL), cs-cart mysql database currently hosted externally on AWS.

AWS S3 and EC2 setup review and recommendations for reducing costs. Webapp is hosted on EC2 and print images are stored on S3.

Review website server loads and tasks/cron jobs which take server resources, looking at ways to reduce server loading.

We are after some advice on best configuration and optimization of database. The initial review and advice also has potential to go from a one-off project to an ongoing consultation and monitoring/maintenance service. We also require optimization of EC2 with possible upgrading.

Long term position available with regular maintenance contract.

Any questions before submitting your proposal feel free to contact us.

Allow queries that takes an address as input (reference address) and performs the following queries
that returns the list of the addresses(already stored on system and geocoded). Note the developer shall provide

are provided in query.

Show me the 3 closest addresses to the reference address where TYPE = a networkdata.id value

PostGIS (GA state data should be loaded
Leaflet

item.title: Senior Full Stack Web Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Senior Full Stack Web Developer for full time employment.

Intergo Interactive is company involved in the development, marketing and operation of SaaS internet businesses. We are a niche and competitive player in our field and we are looking for a senior full stack developer to join our team in order to speed-up development of our current projects and handle and support the development of projects that are in the pipeline.


If you are a self driven and passionate individual, interested to work with a fully remote team that is building and shipping new products constantly then join our team. We take up the challenge to build simple or complex applications then work hard to bring them to market and scale them.  If you like the idea of working in a hybrid work environment with a 100% remote and flexible team that competes globally, constantly growing and challenging itself then this is for you. You can work from your own own space or from our new office in Paphos, Cyprus.  


Responsibilities:
As a member of our small but growing team you will be wearing many hats and be involved in all stages of the development and maintenance of our projects.  Your key daily tasks will include:

* Develop backend applications with PHP, MySQL (Laravel)
* Produce new and maintain mature products.
* Monitor and clear bugs as they appear to make sure of good operation of our products


Knowledge & Skills:
1. Highly skilled and experienced in PHP (We use the Laravel 5+ framework)
2. Strong knowledge of database management and scaling for high cpu/db load products. (We use MySQL & MongoDB on some instances)
3. VueJS experience, ability to manipulate the existing design, consume API's, and reuse design elements.
4. Ability to deal with real time requests arising from process hungry large scale applications. (Reddis, RabbitMQ are a plus)
5. Good HTML/JS/CSS knowledge
6. Excellent analysis, problem-solving and communication skills
7. Experience with GIT depositories and AWS
8. Self-Driven individual with ability to work and coordinate a small team.
9. Excellent organizational and time management skills arising from quickly changing task pool.
10. Fluent English language


Education:
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent or more than 5 years professional PHP development experience

As a 100% remote team we use Slack for communication, GIT for code, AWS for hosting, Trello for task organising. We give opportunities for continual growth and improvement and even though we work remotely we meet some times in random places in the world.
Want to be part of a growing team, that loves building great long term projects, help us grow and achieve great things together?


Thank you for your time and interest! Looking forward to hearing from you


Posted On: August 17, 2018 21:26 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: CSS, JavaScript, Laravel Framework, MongoDB, MySQL Programming, PHP, RabbitMQ, Redis
Country: Cyprus
click to apply

item.title: Development of remote database to store book information (metadata) - Upwork
item.description:
Project Overview:
Create a central database system to store information about books.
The system will need the following features:
• accessible to remote users (using both Windows and MacOS)
• records added via a csv import or web form (both user and guest)
• produce reports (on-screen and csv download) based on filterable criteria
• enable metadata to be stored in multiple languages
• make it easy to update multiple records from one screen

Current size of data:
Number of books: 5,500
Number of users: 3 (all admin users)

Scalability:
Potential number of books: 20,000+
Potential number of users: 1,000+ (if access was given to clients, who may ‘own’ from 1 to 500+ books)

Platform and hosting preference:
No preference.
Currently we collect and store data via our Wordpress-based website. The new database does NOT necessarily need to integrate with this.
However, reliable uptime and response time is mission crucial as the information will be accessed many times each day.
Automated back-ups should be taken at least once per day with a straightforward restore feature.
Our website is hosted with WP Engine, if you recommend a Wordpress-based solution would need to compatible with the features offered by this host.

Next steps:

item.content:encoded:
Project Overview:
Create a central database system to store information about books.
The system will need the following features:
• accessible to remote users (using both Windows and MacOS)
• records added via a csv import or web form (both user and guest)
• produce reports (on-screen and csv download) based on filterable criteria
• enable metadata to be stored in multiple languages
• make it easy to update multiple records from one screen

Current size of data:
Number of books: 5,500
Number of users: 3 (all admin users)

Scalability:
Potential number of books: 20,000+
Potential number of users: 1,000+ (if access was given to clients, who may ‘own’ from 1 to 500+ books)

Platform and hosting preference:
No preference.
Currently we collect and store data via our Wordpress-based website. The new database does NOT necessarily need to integrate with this.
However, reliable uptime and response time is mission crucial as the information will be accessed many times each day.
Automated back-ups should be taken at least once per day with a straightforward restore feature.
Our website is hosted with WP Engine, if you recommend a Wordpress-based solution would need to compatible with the features offered by this host.

Next steps:
We are looking for a supplier to recommend a solution, along with the advantages of their preferred platform. We also need an estimate of costs and timescales, which can be staged if appropriate.

Budget: $2,000

item.title: S/W developer with experience of using I/O boards to control and monitor industrial processes. - Upwork
item.description:
Software developer with experience of using I/O boards to control and monitor industrial processes.

The project is about develop a software that will be used for manufacturing tests of various electronic products.
It means to read and set different I/O ports and compare with expected result, and log the result.

It could for example be that we have a setup of 10 electronic boards to be programmed and tested simultaneously

1) Start programming device
2) Starts sequence of test points
a. Could be set an output and read an input
3) After testing, a test result should be logged
4) If needed perform some calibration
5) Set factory configuration
6) Update a database on a server.

The freelancer should be able to work independently. It is an advantage if you can assist in designing an architecture and  database for logging data and test result of each test object.

Software should be flexible so we can re-use parts for different products.

item.title: Senior Python developer - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We are looking for a developer to join our technical team. We work in the webdriver automation industry. This is a job with a lot of challenges, and a lot of new things every day!
To apply to this job, you should be good at Python and understand Django REST and Selenium, but the most important thing is that you have to be a QUICK LEARNER. If you have a problem, you should be able to solve it by yourself (searching stackoverflow, reading docs…).
Also please note that we are looking for a minimum of 4 hours per day, and the project will scale quickly up to full time.

Responsibilities

• Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code
• Developing web automation in Phyton with Selenium
• Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and performant applications
• Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server side logic
• Integration of data storage solutions (SQL Databases)
• Use server-side logic to integrate user-facing elements.
• Develop software related to asset management (or other core business).
• Identify and suggest various opportunities to improve efficiency and functionality.
• Integrate data storage solutions & implement data security and protection.


Skills And Qualifications

• Expert in Python, with knowledge of Selenium and Django REST Framework.
• Familiarity with some ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries
• Able to integrate multiple data sources and databases into one system
• Understanding of the threading limitations of Python, and multi-process architecture
• Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
• Knowledge of user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
• Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
• Familiarity with event-driven programming in Python
• Able to create a fully functional API from Django REST Framwork and SQL
• Able to create database schemas that represent and support business processes
• Strong unit test and debugging skills
• Proficient understanding of code versioning tools (such as Git, Mercurial or SVN)
Thanks.


Posted On: August 17, 2018 21:26 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Other - Software Development
Skills: Django, MySQL Programming, Python, Selenium
Country: Hong Kong
click to apply

item.title: Backend Database Developer For Computation Chemistry Platform - Upwork
item.description:
Construction of molecular structure database on Azure cloud using SQL. This database will contain common names of the structures, identifiers, properties, and pharmacology information. Part of the database will be the structure notations (UNII, InChl, SMILES, etc.); these notations will be referenced to build the 2 and 3D structures in a separate "molecular builder" application which will integrate with the SQL molecular database.

The source of the molecular structure data will come from governmental agency websites (such as the EPA/FDA) and various other free online molecular catalogs/data-sets. We will need to extract this data and ensure any updates to the public databases are reflected in our molecular structure database in real-time. It is important we  design the architecture so that there is a production instance for on-going production use and a SANDBOX environmental where new structures or updates to the catalogs (including the addition of new data-sets) are imported into.

Myself and my project manager will be working alongside the development team on a daily basis to help answer questions.

Country: United States

item.title: Java / C Senior Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Sqlite4java is a minimalistic, open-source Java wrapper for SQLite – a free, compact, robust, embeddable SQL database engine. Sqlite4java is built with the purpose to provide high-performance, low-garbage interface to SQLite for desktop Java applications. The library is located at https://bitbucket.org/almworks/sqlite4java.

The library was originally built at ALM Works to support products like Deskzilla and Jira Client. As the active development of those products subsided, sqlite4java got less and less attention. However, it started to be used by other projects around the world, in particular, on mobile / IoT platforms and low-power processors.

At this time, we're looking for an experienced software engineer who would take care of the library on a task-by-task basis. The following are the tasks that we're looking to address:
- Upgrading embedded SQLite version to the latest and greatest.
- Addressing issues filed by the users on the Bitbucket's issue system.
- Refactoring build's environment and make the library build with Maven.
- Reviewing new features of SQLite and adding support for those to the wrapper.

Requirements:
- Excellent knowledge of Java and C programming languages
- Knowledge of JNI
- Experience with different platforms
- Experience with Android is a plus
- Experience with ARM processors is a plus
- Example code demonstrating good design and coding practices is required.

The Process:
We will discuss the scope, split it into tasks and do the estimation per task. You will be submitting pull requests, while which will be reviewed by a senior developer at ALM Works. You will get comments, suggestions and other feedback, and you'll need to address all the feedback before the pull request is accepted.


Posted On: August 17, 2018 21:26 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Other - Software Development
Skills: C, Java
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Unreal Engine UE4 blueprint programming/scripting - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there.  I am a UE4 content creator, looking for a programmer to do some blueprint work.  I have a client I update modular assets for who’s ideas are simply larger than my ability to execute on a strict timetable.  No time to fumble about you see.
The basic idea is to generate a local private-use “tool” to view various asset layouts inside proposed building geometries. An archviz helper of sorts.  This isn’t a game, this isn’t some marketing wiz bang presentation.  It needs to be simple, basic and straightforward as it will have very limited people using it, but are from different background from interior designers, to engineers, to office admins.
While ideas are great on the board, cost is where the rubber hits the road.  To that end I’m breaking this down into three parts so that I can gage just how much my client likes his idea.  I’m separating the simpler stuff from the more… challenging stuff for this reason.   To that end I am going to request a quote based in parts: A, B and C.

Programing Quote A
• Camera that can:
o Travel around a room, FPV style
o Can snap to predetermined points
o Can switch to an isometric zoomed out view, hide the “ceiling” and navigate around the view in a user controlled orbit
• Overview features:
o Mini map of room
o Showing camera and how it is pointing
o Furniture outlines
o Important internal wall features like electrical outlets, gas lines, etc
Programing Quote B
• UI Database:
o that can pull up a list of modular assets (tables chairs, shelves etc).
o can filter by type (furniture, utilities, etc).
• Drag and drop assets onto a room layout.
• Can rotate assets in 90 degree increments.
• Save/Load layouts.
Programing Quote C
• Can hide/unhide walls to reveal power lines/ gas lines/ outlets/ etc.
• Can evaluate when assets are within a door opening radius.
• Can evaluate when specific assets that, for example are electrical, are too far away from an outlet.
• Can output to desktop/mobile
• Can output to VR
• Can output to AR
To get the ball rolling, please let me know your questions and any additional details you need to generate an estimate.
To move forward we will need to know your cost estimates for part A, B and C, what you need for completion, a timetable to complete, and your availability.  Unfortunately, time is a factor.

Cheers,
Alberto


Posted On: August 17, 2018 21:26 UTC
Category: IT & Networking > Network & System Administration
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: WEB PAGE Builder FULL STACK Dev. Needed For Full Time, Long Term Role - Upwork
item.description:
We want to change the way website are created and we are looking for 3 "Full Stack" developers.  So if want to work on the leading edge tech, in a fast paste entrepreneurial culture, then this is the perfect job for you.

We are in the middle of creating an "Enterprise Website and Landing Page Builder" that will compete with Wix Lead Pages Unbounce and Wordpress.

Our company has made the elite Inc. 500 and 5000 fastest growing companies in the United States - and we are continuing to grow.

That’s where you come in...

If you’ve are looking for exciting long-term opportunity then we have the perfect virtual position for you.  More importantly, if you want your talents and experience to make a real difference in people's lives, then this project might be the "Perfect Project" for you.

A Little Big About Our Company & Culture....

Our Company, with headquarters in South Florida, is a dynamic, high-growth technology services (SaaS) company with a passion to develop best-in-class marketing automation software.  We have 13 "Enterprise Software Platforms" that are revolutionizing the online marketing industry and this next platform that you will be building will be incredible.

: : Key Responsibilities : :

*Software Development - High quality, efficient programming of new enterprise software, enhancements to existing products, code refactoring and ‘bug’ fixing.  

*Code - Premium CLEAN, ORGANIZED AND WELL DOCUMENT code quality is a non-negotiable. Take part in code review sessions and refactoring projects to fully optimize features / applications.  

*Performance Management - Services such as Newrelic and Sentry will be used on a daily basis to analyze the performance of the software and you will need to make sure your code and features are always running.

*Collaboration - Collaborate with Technical Leadership, Product Management & Customer Support to build new features or resolve technical discrepancies.

*Training - Participating in on-going training and professional development is expected.

: : Knowledge Requirements : :

*Expert knowledge of Codeigniter, Laravel, Kohana
*Expert knowledge of MySQL, Mongo DB, NoSQL Databases and database optimization
*Expert knowledge of working with REST Services
*Expert knowledge of Social APIs - Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Flickr and Pinterest
*Expert knowledge of OOP, Ajax, jquery and PhantomJS
*Expert knowledge of version control - git/github/gitflow
*Experience with FFMPEG is a plus
*Experience with RabbitMQ is a plus
*Good understanding of continuous integration
*Ability to integrate HTML/CSS/JS into back-end
*Familiarity with Responsive Design
*Familiarity with HTML5, CSS
*Familiarity with ReactJS, Vue JS
*Familiarity with EC2, RDS, Load Balancers

TO APPLY YOU MUST SEND A COVER LETTER AND ANSWER THESE REQUIREMENTS:
!!! Minimum Requirements !!!  

REQUIREMENT 1:  Please send us 2 Links to WEB PAGE BUILDING Software of similar software or screenshots of the software that you have built so we can see the enterprise nature of your experience.

REQUIREMENT 2:  Please tell us "exactly" your role in creating the software in  Requirement 1.
What did the software do and what were the features you built?
What did you code in? How much of the software did you build?  Was it from scratch or you just added features?

REQUIREMENT 3: *Schedule - Must be able to work 5am to 2pm Eastern Standard Time hours (including hour lunch). Evening & weekend requirements are limited. Overtime is possible.
*English - Must be fluent in English including exceptional written, conversational and video presentation abilities.  Please confirm you understand this in your cover letter.

REQUIREMENT 4: Experience & Education : :

*Experience - A minimum of 5 years of direct experience with the responsibilities above required. Candidates who have worked on marketing automation products, strongly preferred.  Please confirm you have 5+ years as a full stack developer in your cover letter.

We look forward to working with you and reading your cover letter and the 4 requirements.

This job is open now and can start in the next week if your ready.

Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: AJAX, CodeIgniter, CSS, GitHub, JavaScript, jQuery, Laravel Framework, MongoDB, MySQL Administration, PhantomJS, PHP, REST
Country: United States

item.title: Wordpress Developer with Moodle Experience Desired - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a WordPress Developer and Designer responsible for both back-end and front-end development, including creating WordPress themes and using plugins for a complete re-design of the website at http://pro.fitnessformulary.com.

***** DO NOT CONTACT US OUTSIDE OF UPWORK *****

Critical features/elements of the WordPress site are:
- online education tools using videos and/or written documents
- knowledge evaluation tools using quizzies and other testing tools
- multi-level membership management tools where Fitness Club organizations and franchisors, their respective franchisees, subsidiaries or locations and each of their respective managers and trainers can create detailed social profiles to interact with others within and outside of their organization, share learnings, experiences and advice
- ecommerce capabilities for the purchase of collateral print and digital materials for fitness clubs to use
- a repository of resources such as images, documents, HTML email formats, etc
- an event calendar for internal training and external industry events
- blogs
- searchable knowledge database with FAQ and Q&A capabilities

This position requires a combination of programming skills (namely PHP(WordPress), HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript) and design(understanding layout, element arrangements on the screen, the color and font choices, and so on). The candidate should have a strong understanding of industry trends and content management systems. Experience with the responsive and adaptive design is strongly preferred.

Responsibilities

- Conceiving new architecture based upon requirements
- Designing and implementing new features and functionality
- Specifying technologies to be used
- Ensuring high-performance and availability, and managing all technical aspects of the CMS

item.content:encoded:
We are seeking a WordPress Developer and Designer responsible for both back-end and front-end development, including creating WordPress themes and using plugins for a complete re-design of the website at http://pro.fitnessformulary.com.

***** DO NOT CONTACT US OUTSIDE OF UPWORK *****

Critical features/elements of the WordPress site are:
- online education tools using videos and/or written documents
- knowledge evaluation tools using quizzies and other testing tools
- multi-level membership management tools where Fitness Club organizations and franchisors, their respective franchisees, subsidiaries or locations and each of their respective managers and trainers can create detailed social profiles to interact with others within and outside of their organization, share learnings, experiences and advice
- ecommerce capabilities for the purchase of collateral print and digital materials for fitness clubs to use
- a repository of resources such as images, documents, HTML email formats, etc
- an event calendar for internal training and external industry events
- blogs
- searchable knowledge database with FAQ and Q&A capabilities

This position requires a combination of programming skills (namely PHP(WordPress), HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript) and design(understanding layout, element arrangements on the screen, the color and font choices, and so on). The candidate should have a strong understanding of industry trends and content management systems. Experience with the responsive and adaptive design is strongly preferred.

Responsibilities

- Conceiving new architecture based upon requirements
- Designing and implementing new features and functionality
- Specifying technologies to be used
- Ensuring high-performance and availability, and managing all technical aspects of the CMS
- Helping formulate an effective, responsive design and turning it into a working site

- Good understanding of front-end technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery

- Ability to convert comprehensive layout and wireframes into working HTML pages

item.title: Database Developer to build Data Hub (Data Warehouse, Redshift, AWS) - Upwork
item.description:
You will be responsible for building out an AWS-based Data Hub / Data Lake.

Looking for a candidate with: 
- Strong database design with high-quality standards
- Proven production experience designing and developing data marts, warehouse, data lakes
- Ability to document data definition, capturing schema design
- Ability to produce well-written, non-trivial SQL
- Experience with AWS Redshift / Postgres
- Strong communication skills

Ideally also has experience with:
- S3-based Data Lakes
- AWS Athena

You will be part of a small team building a Data platform (Data Hub + ETL + Tableau Reporting + Integration with other systems). You will be responsible for the Data Hub portion of the platform.

This is a 4-month full-time position. Work to be done remotely, with Agile development (sprints).
